home.slogan: Building bridges between Morocco and Germany
home.intro: The Association of Friends of Germany is a non-profit organization based in Marrakech. It aims to promote cultural, educational, and economic exchanges between Morocco and Germany.

history.title: Our History
history.content: Presentation of the foundation of the association and its motivations. Explanation of the link between Morocco and Germany.

mission.title: Our Mission and Values
mission.mission: Promote cultural, economic, and academic exchanges between Morocco and Germany.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Presentation of the executive board with photos and short biographies. Mention of active members and institutional partners.

language.title: German Language Courses üá©üá™
language.content: Organization of courses for beginners and advanced learners. Online and in-person courses. Available certifications and exams.

cultural.title: Cultural Events üé≠
cultural.content: German film festivals. Art exhibitions and literary meetings. Conferences on German history and culture.

education.title: Educational Exchanges üéì
education.content: Mobility programs for students and teachers. Partnerships with German universities and schools. Workshops and seminars on studies and scholarships in Germany.

economic.title: Economic Cooperation üíº
economic.content: Connecting Moroccan and German entrepreneurs. Economic forums and networking. Conferences on business opportunities in Germany.

support.title: Support for Moroccans in Germany & Germans in Morocco üè°
support.content: Guidance and advice for Moroccans wishing to go to Germany. Reception and support for Germans living in Morocco. Help with administrative procedures and cultural integration.

news.title: News & Blog
news.description: Latest news on Moroccan-German relations. In-depth articles on the culture and economy of both countries. Testimonials from students and professionals who have benefited from the association's activities.

partnerships.title: Partnerships & Collaborations
partnerships.description: Partner institutions (e.g., embassies, Goethe-Institut, DAAD, German companies). Partner universities and schools. Joint projects with other cultural associations.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Photos and videos of past events and activities. Testimonials and interviews with members and participants.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: Experiences of former language course participants. Opinions of students who have benefited from educational exchanges. Testimonials from entrepreneurs who have found opportunities through the association.

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Explanation of the use of donations.
